mapper.insert: insert into issue_coupon values (issue_coupon_seq.nextval, #{memberNo}, #{couponNo}, sysdate, sysdate+14, 1)
mapper.select: select issue_no as issueNo, member_no as memberNo, coupon_no as couponNo, issue_date as issueDate, to_char(end_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as endDate, coupon_status as couponStatus from issue_coupon
mapper.update: update issue_coupon set coupon_status = 2 where issue_no = #{issueNo}
